definition: flower/earlobe/fig. item on both sides/classifier for flowers, clouds etc
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to move the jaw/to munch/to masticate
see 貢多拉|贡多拉[gong4 duo1 la1]
to chew on a large slab (idiom); a large mouthful is hard to chew/to tuck into a great meal

sentences.english: Dora tied her dog to the street railings.
sentences.chinese: 朵拉把她的狗拴在街旁的栏杆上了。

sentences.english: I hated to think of Dora's unhappiness at losing my letters.
sentences.chinese: 我不愿想象朵拉在丢失我的信后的痛苦状。

sentences.english: Ou tell father, Sue gave cutting line seven hundred thousand.
sentences.chinese: 伊欧告诉父亲，苏切给了朵索七十万。

sentences.english: Two people chat more and more happy, finally, for within the athar eat ice cream, please.
sentences.chinese: 两个人越聊越开心，最后，朵索要请阿萨内吃冰淇淋。

sentences.english: But, does everyone need to send ninety-nine at once?
sentences.chinese: 可是，有规定每个人一次都得送九十九朵吗？

sentences.english: But almost cold, saying, even so, she will at least one line up.
sentences.chinese: 顺心却冰冷的说，就算这样，起码她将朵索养大了。

sentences.english: After a time, warmer and comfortable, Delgado slept.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，德尔珈朵睡着了，温暖而舒适。

sentences.english: Melandru's Shot reduced recharge to 8 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 梅兰朵射击减少回复时间至8秒。

sentences.english: A holiday, the rainbow decided to take her out to play, also let oneself relax.
sentences.chinese: 朵放假了，彩虹决定带她出去玩，也让自己散散心。

sentences.english: Or place white flowers on your table.
sentences.chinese: 或者把白色花的朵放置你的桌上。

sentences.english: The name tag on Dora's uniform also bears her title of night manager.
sentences.chinese: 朵拉制服上的名牌也印著她夜班经理的职称。

sentences.english: "I'll see the stone first," he said when Delgado met him.
sentences.chinese: “我要先看看石头，”德尔珈朵和他见面时，他说道。

sentences.english: Just take ten or so flowers and soak them in hot water.
sentences.chinese: 取十几朵木槿花放进开水中。

sentences.english: Brilliant season, you are the gorgeous garden of the "flower".
sentences.chinese: 灿烂季节中，你就是那艳丽花园中的那一“朵”。

sentences.english: What do Doral, Simon and Sharon all have in common?
sentences.chinese: 朵拉，西蒙和莎伦之间有什么共同点？

sentences.english: Twelve red roses, anyway, would be a must on Valentines Day.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎么说，情人节必须有12朵红玫瑰。

definition: crowded/framework for silkworms/gather foliage/bunch/classifier for bunched objects
style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others)/water-lily
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
